src:
Round-Up 5 Berita Terpopuler
Sederet Anggaran Janggal di DKI, Respons Jokowi soal 'Desa Hantu'
06 Nov 2019, 14:00 by Tim detikcom


Foto:Balai Kota DKI Jakarta. (Yuni-detikcom)

Jakarta - Berita terpopuler detikFinance Rabu (6/11/2019) adalah tentang sederet anggaran aneh di daftar rencana anggaran 2020 Pemerintah Provinsi DKI Jakarta. Selain lem aibon Rp 82 miliar, masih ada alokasi anggaran lain senilai miliaran rupiahSelain itu, berita terpopuler lainnya adalah Presiden Jokow Widodo buka suara soal 'desa hantu' pengisap dana desa. Apa kata Jokowi soal 'desa hantu' itu? Baca selengkapnya dalam deretan 5 berita terpopuler detikFinance berikut ini: (hns/hns)
text:
Round-Up of 5 Most Popular News
A row of odd budget in DKI, Jokowi's response to 'Ghost Village'
Nov 6 2019, 2:00 PM by Tim detikcom


Photo: DKI Jakarta City Hall. (Yuni-detikcom)

Jakarta - detikFinance most popular news Wednesday (11/06/2019) is about a series of strange budget in the 2020 budget list of DKI Jakarta Provincial Government. Aside from the Rp. 82 billion aibon glue, there are still other budget allocations worth billions of rupiah. In addition, the most popular news is that President Jokow Widodo is opening a voice about the 'ghost village' which absorbs village funds. What did Jokowi say about the 'ghost village'? Read more in the following 5 most popular detikFinance news stories: (hns / hns)
